description:
****UPDATED 2016: AUDIO ISSUES AND REVERB ON LECTURE 24 FIXED****

Learn how to crowdfund without spending 1000s of dollars upfront. You can successfully crowdfund an innovative private label product with this step-by-step guide.

The goal of this course is to give you a promotional strategy and planning guide so that you can successfully crowdfund a PRIVATE LABEL PRODUCT to sell through Amazon, your own dropship store, or through a chain retail store.

This course is for you if:

  • you want to crowdfund a physical product (no apps or software)
  • you tried to crowdfund before and failed
  • you have trouble promoting or pre-launching a product
  • you don't know where to start when designing your campaign page


This course does not parrot the same articles and resources on crowdfunding. I called this course "The Mythbuster Course" because you will find following my strategy you do not need what many publications call for. You will find that you DO NOT NEED:


  • To spend 1000s on your campaign video
  • Spend money on Pay-per-click ads (No Facebook or Google ads)
  • To spend months trying to get media coverage


This course covers topics not covered in ANYWHERE ELSE like...

  • How to create a video without spending 1000s on a videographer
  • How to properly curate a social media campaign without needing 1000s of followers
  • Innovative ways to build your audience


In addition you'll learn:

  • How to properly set up your campaign page and make it look professional
  • A hack to get Indiegogo or your chosen Crowdfunding platform to promote your product for you
  • How to streamline your Crowdfunding campaign and lower stress during your campaign


30 Day Money Back Guarantee if you feel this course is not for you.

If you are currently thinking of crowdfunding a product, even your own inventiion, this course will increase your confidence and give you a more control over your campaign outcome.

Take the guesswork out of how to structure your campaign


See you inside!
title: Crowdfunding for Private Label Products- Textbook Included
